sentences.en: Dispensary TCM should establish perfect consulting service system to improve the quality of pharmaceutical service.
sentences.cn: 中药房应建立完善的中药咨询服务体系,以提高药学服务质量.

sentences.en: He bought some pills from the dispensary.
sentences.cn: 他从学校的医务室买了一些药片.

sentences.en: Now we're able to do consulting for building hospitals, dispensary, diagnosis center.
sentences.cn: 现我们可为建设医院, 药房, 诊断中心提供顾问咨询.

sentences.en: Perfumes, Confectionary, Rice, Pulses, Sugar, Molasses and Anabolic Harmones From British Dispensary . Confectionaries.
sentences.cn: 采购产品香水, 糖果, 大米, 豆类, 糖, 糖蜜及促蛋白合成类.

sentences.en: Please take it to the dispensary.
sentences.cn: 你把它拿到药房去取药.

sentences.en: Shirley: dispensary closed. Here is the given prescription.
sentences.cn: 雪莉: (医院的)药房关了.这是(医生)给的处方.

sentences.en: Take the prescription to the dispensary and they'll make it out.
sentences.cn: 拿这个处方到药房,他们就会给你配药了.

sentences.en: Take this prescription to the dispensary for your medicine.
sentences.cn: 把这张药方拿到配药处去配药.

sentences.en: Yes, you do have the flu. Take this prescription to the dispensary for your medicine.
sentences.cn: 对, 您的确是流感, 拿这张药方到药房配药.

sentences.en: You can get it filled at dispensary.

words.tran_cn: [药]药房；（学校、兵营或工厂的）诊疗所；防治站

trans.tran_en: a place where medicines are prepared and given out, especially in a hospital
